Articles.Content:
Hello all

This is my first craft built since I've restarted playing KSP this year, The KF-15 Reaper is a twin engine, single seat, supersonic Air Superiority fighter offering the Highest performance. The inspiration mainly came from the F-15 with bits and pieces from other fourth gen fighters. Mods used are listed in the download link.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The aircraft is equipped with eight air to air missiles and a 20mm cannon with 680 rounds of ammunition. An AN/APG-63 Radar and an AAQ-28 targeting camera provides good fire control and stabilized view of any area or target

The KA-15 Electric Reaper is the Electronic warfare/Defense suppression variant of the standar KF-15, It is equipped with electronic jamming and anti-radar weapons. A second cockpit was added to house the Radar intercept/Electronic warfare officer. The addition of this cockpit forced the radarto be moved on top of a single tail fin.

Standard loadout of the KA-15, four AN/ALQ-131 Jamming pods, four AIM-120 Missiles and four HARM anti-radar missiles. This craft does not have the 20mm cannon found on combat Reapers.

Download link for the KF-15 Reaper:http://kerbalx.com/Growler117/KF-15-Reaper

Electric Reaper still needs some polishing, message me if you want the file.

Edited September 26, 2015 by Growler117
Added content
